mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild 4

mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild5.name: Mage Guild 5

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases increases morale for troops defending the city.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 sulfur each day.

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with First Aid Tent.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

horde1.description: Torture Chamber increases weekly production of Slayers by 6 per week.
horde1.name: Torture Chamber

horde1Upgr.description: Torture Chamber increases weekly production of Executioners by 6 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Torture Chamber

horde2.description: Choir Section increases weekly production of Sextons by 2 per week.
horde2.name: Choir Section

horde2Upgr.description: Choir Section increases weekly production of Cantors by 2 per week.
horde2Upgr.name: Choir Section

special3.description: The Confession Chapel increases morale by 1 for troops defending the city.
special3.name: Confession Chapel

special1.description: Donation Station earns your kingdom 350 gold per day.
special1.name: Donation Station

special2.description: Salvation Station increases the luck of the garrison hero by +2 when defending against a siege.
special2.name: Salvation Station

grail.description: Light of Judgement increases weekly creature generation by 50 percent and adds 5000 gold per day. It allows every fire magic spells to become expert, and provides extra 10 attack and spellpower for defending heroes.
grail.name: Light of Judgement

dwellingLvl1.description: Mound allows you to recruit Sleuthhounds.
dwellingLvl1.name: Mound

dwellingLvl2.description: Execution Ground allows you to recruit Slayers.
dwellingLvl2.name: Execution Ground

dwellingLvl3.description: Hunters' Guild allows you to recruit Witch Hunters.
dwellingLvl3.name: Hunters' Guild

dwellingLvl4.description: Churchyard allows you to recruit Gourmands.
dwellingLvl4.name: Churchyard

dwellingLvl5.description: Auditorium allows you to recruit Sextons.
dwellingLvl5.name: Auditorium

dwellingLvl6.description: Order of Templars allows you to recruit Templars.
dwellingLvl6.name: Order of Templars

dwellingLvl7.description: Shrine of Judgement allows you to recruit Punishers.
dwellingLvl7.name: Shrine of Judgement

dwellingUpLvl1.description: Upg. Mound allows you to recruit Patrols.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Mound

dwellingUpLvl2.description: Upg. Execution Ground allows you to recruit Executioners.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Execution Gound

dwellingUpLvl3.description: Upg. Hunters' Guild allows you to recruit Evil Hunters.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Hunters' Guild

dwellingUpLvl4.description: Upg. Churchyard allows you to recruit Gluttons.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Churchyard

dwellingUpLvl5.description: Upg. Auditorium allows you to recruit Cantors.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Auditorium

dwellingUpLvl6.description: Upg. Order of Templars allows you to recruit Dark Templars.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Order of Templars

dwellingUpLvl7.description: Upg. Shrine of Judgement allows you to recruit Chasteners.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Shrine of Judgement
